channel.title: Reviews on HXL
channel.description: Recent content in Reviews on HXL

item.title: The Little Things
item.author: j@hxl.io (Jordan Finnigan)
item.description: Story # The Little Things reminds me of two (2) other things I’ve seen: David Fincher’s 1995 classic Seven (SE7EN) and season 1 of True Detective.

item.title: Children of the Great Extinction
item.author: j@hxl.io (Jordan Finnigan)
item.description: Intro # Betraying The Archetype’s Terminate Damnation was one of the first Christian “death metal” albums I had ever listened to when it came out in 2005.
